description: The standard a2 script module collection.
name: a2.modules
news:
* UniFormat: repaired direct hotkey replacing
* UniFormat: scope change ON on direct replace hotkeys
  and fixed parsing the hotkey settings
* UniFormat: fixed before/after msg in shrink case
* UniFormat: tweaked order of tooltip and pasting for a little nicer ux
* gtranslate & UniFormat: use `hotkey.get_settings` for way simpler registering of hotkeys from item editor
* Created README.md for UniFormat
* gtranslate: fixed Creating New translation presets
* UniFormat: refactored letter parsing.
  Now we can have same replacements from different keys and lower/upper case still works.
